translation.en: -[Cian] Hello. -Hi.
translation.zh:
‎-你好
‎-嗨

translation.en: Wow, you look great.
translation.zh: ‎哇喔 你看起来棒极了

translation.en: I love this. [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎我很喜欢

translation.en: -[Cian] Shall we get started? -Yes.
translation.zh:
‎-我们可以开始了吗？
‎-可以

translation.en: Are you looking for love?
translation.zh: ‎你在寻找爱情吗？

translation.en: Uh, yes. Unquestionably so.
translation.zh: ‎是的 毫无疑问

translation.en: I don't want to be single forever, no. 'Cause I don't wanna feel lonely.
translation.zh:
‎我也不想单身一辈子
‎因为我不想感到孤独

translation.en: I haven't dated in 33 years.
translation.zh: ‎我已经有33年没有谈恋爱了

translation.en: It's… It's really hard.
translation.zh: ‎真是挺难的

translation.en: To have a lovely lady,
translation.zh: ‎能找到一位可爱的女士

translation.en: oh my goodness,
translation.zh: ‎我的天呐

translation.en: I'm all for it.
translation.zh: ‎想想就激动

translation.en: [narrator] Finding love can be hard for anyone.
translation.zh: ‎寻找爱情 对任何人来说都是件难事

translation.en: Keep looking for that fish in your pond.
translation.zh: ‎继续搜寻你池塘里的那条鱼

translation.en: You're in competition with -all the other young men. -[groans]
translation.zh: ‎你要跟这么其他的多年轻男士竞争啊

translation.en: [narrator] And for some people, it can feel like an impossible dream.
translation.zh:
‎而对有些人来说
‎这感觉就像是个不可能实现的梦想

translation.en: Uh, let's change the topic. Can we change the topic?
translation.zh:
‎我们换个话题吧
‎我们能换个话题吗？

translation.en: You find your Prince Charming. I find my Cinderella. Bam!
translation.zh:
‎你找到你的白马王子
‎我找到我的灰姑娘 砰！

translation.en: [narrator] This series follows people on the autism spectrum…
translation.zh:
‎本剧集跟随
‎数名处于自闭症谱系中的人…

translation.en: I dub thee Sir James.
translation.zh: ‎吾授予汝詹姆斯爵士的称号

translation.en: Through this process, he might find love.
translation.zh: ‎通过这个过程 他可能会找到爱情

translation.en: -Oh yeah. -[woman] Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-是啊
‎-是的

translation.en: [narrator] …as they navigate the confusing world of relationships…
translation.zh: ‎见证他们摸爬滚打于恋爱…

translation.en: I really like how you hold my hand.
translation.zh: ‎我好喜欢你这样牵着我的手

translation.en: [narrator] …and dating.
translation.zh: ‎与约会的复杂世界中

translation.en: Do you wanna be my girlfriend?
translation.zh: ‎你想做我的女朋友吗？

translation.en: -[Cian] Hello. -How's things going?
translation.zh:
‎-你好
‎-最近怎么样啊？

translation.en: -[Cian] Good. How are you? -I'm doing fine. Thank you so much.
translation.zh:
‎-挺好的 你呢？
‎-我也挺好的 非常感谢你

translation.en: -[Cian] So you're ready for this? -Um, you bet.
translation.zh: ‎那么 你准备好了吗？ ‎当然

translation.en: My name is Dani.
translation.zh: ‎我的名字叫丹妮

translation.en: I am 26 years old.
translation.zh: ‎我今年26岁

translation.en: You could say I have a mixture of six different nationalities.
translation.zh: ‎你可以说我是六个不同国际的混合体

translation.en: So mostly Mexican, Caucasian, and a smidge of Asian.
translation.zh:
‎大部分是墨西哥、高加索人
‎再加上一丁点的亚洲裔

translation.en: I am single, and I am on the autism spectrum.
translation.zh: ‎我现在单身 我在自闭症谱系上

translation.en: -[Cian] Are you looking for love, Dani? -I am.
translation.zh:
‎-你是在寻找爱情吗 丹妮？
‎-是的

translation.en: [sighs] Unfortunately, it's just so hard to find a boyfriend.
translation.zh: ‎不幸的是 找男朋友真是太困难了

translation.en: It's… [sighs]
You could imagine, I have to kiss many frogs to find the right guy.
translation.zh:
‎你也可以想象 在找到对的人之前
‎我必须要吻多少只青蛙才行

translation.en: It's not just about the looks.
translation.zh: ‎外表不是唯一重要的

translation.en: I'm looking for somebody who is motivated and has really great hygiene,
translation.zh:
‎我在找一个有上进心
‎并且很讲卫生的人

translation.en: because I don't like bad breath.
translation.zh: ‎因为我不喜欢口臭

translation.en: [narrator] Dani lives in Los Angeles with her aunt and uncle.
translation.zh:
‎丹妮住在洛杉矶
‎跟她的姨妈与姨夫一起

translation.en: -Serve you some coffee. -Thank you.
translation.zh:
‎-给你倒些咖啡
‎-谢谢你

translation.en: [narrator] She's lived with them since she was 11 years old.
translation.zh:
‎自打她11岁起
‎就开始跟他们一起生活了

translation.en: It's hard for me to find the right person who is so much like me.
translation.zh:
‎对我来说 想找到对的人是非常难的
‎而且他还要非常像我

translation.en: -I've been desperate to look for love. -[aunt] Don't be desperate, Dani.
translation.zh: ‎我一直在绝望地寻找爱情 ‎不要太绝望 丹妮

translation.en: I want somebody with a career who can win good bucks, good salaries.
translation.zh:
‎我想要找一个有份好工作
‎能够赚大钱的 工资要高

translation.en: I need somebody who's financially secure, who can maintain a company.
translation.zh:
‎我需要一个收入稳定
‎能够经营好一家公司的人

translation.en: [Cian] You're not a gold digger, are you, Dani?
translation.zh:
‎-你该不会是个拜金女吧 丹妮？
‎-是啊

translation.en: -Yeah. -[chuckles] "Yeah."
translation.zh:
‎-你该不会是个拜金女吧 丹妮？
‎-是啊 ‎-什么？
‎-“是啊”

translation.en: Know what a gold digger is?
translation.zh: ‎你知道拜金女是什么意思吗？

translation.en: Gold digger means they're trying to look for guys who are rich.
translation.zh:
‎拜金女的意思就是
‎她们在找那些有钱的男人

translation.en: -[uncle] Yes. -[aunt] Is that you?
translation.zh:
‎-没错
‎-你也是吗？

translation.en: -Pretty much, but… -[both laugh]
translation.zh: ‎基本上是吧 但…

translation.en: Yeah, I think where that comes from is her dad.
translation.zh:
‎是啊 我觉得她这个想法
‎是从她爸这里来的

translation.en: My sister, which is her mom, and her husband were married.
translation.zh:
‎我的妹妹 也就是她妈妈
‎她和她丈夫结婚后

translation.en: He didn't work.
translation.zh: ‎他不工作

translation.en: So he was always at home with the girls while my sister was working all the time.
translation.zh:
‎所以他总是在家里带女儿们
‎而我妹妹整天都在工作

translation.en: So she doesn't want that.
translation.zh: ‎所以她不想要这样的

translation.en: It's called a dysfunctional upbringing.
translation.zh: ‎这叫做在不健全的家庭中长大

translation.en: Yeah, but you turned out just fine. Both you and your sister, right?
translation.zh:
‎是啊 但你结果不是挺好的吗？
‎你和你妹妹都好

translation.en: -Right? -Yes.
translation.zh:
‎-对吧？
‎-是的

translation.en: I wanted to find somebody special, somebody who can depend on me.
translation.zh:
‎我想要找一个特别的人
‎一个能够依靠我的人

translation.en: We want to depend on each other,
translation.zh: ‎我们想要互相依靠

translation.en: and work together to have a sustainable living.
translation.zh: ‎共同合作 过上可持续的生活

translation.en: My aunt would tell me,
translation.zh: ‎我姨妈会跟我说

translation.en: "There's many fish in the sea. You'll eventually catch a big one."
translation.zh:
‎“大海里面有的是鱼
‎你早晚会钓上一条大的”

translation.en: "You'll eventually catch a whale."
translation.zh: ‎“你早晚会钓上一条鲸鱼的”

translation.en: Well… [laughs]
It's a metaphor.
translation.zh: ‎这是一个比喻

translation.en: You remember your practice boyfriend?
translation.zh: ‎你还记得你的练习男友吗？

translation.en: Well, um, I do.
translation.zh: ‎嗯 我知道

translation.en: [Cian] What's a practice boyfriend, Dani?
translation.zh: ‎什么是练习男友啊 丹妮？

translation.en: A practice boyfriend is, um, somebody that you, um, use for practicing.
translation.zh: ‎练习男友是你拿来练习的人

translation.en: [Cian] What kind of things did you practice?
translation.zh: ‎你们都练习了哪些东西啊？

translation.en: Kissing and, um…
translation.zh: ‎接吻和…

translation.en: To her, it was just practice. To him, it was like, "I have a girlfriend." [laughs]
translation.zh:
‎对她来说只不过是练习而已
‎可对他来说是：“我有女朋友了”

translation.en: I didn't say, "It's a practice." I never mentioned that.
translation.zh:
‎我并没有说：“这是在练习”
‎我从没提起过

translation.en: -[aunt] So you crushed his heart? -Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎所以你最后伤透了他的心？ ‎是啊

translation.en: Because she wanted to learn how to kiss,
translation.zh: ‎因为她想学如何接吻

translation.en: so we looked up a YouTube video about how to learn how to kiss,
translation.zh:
‎于是我们上YouTube找了个
‎如何学习接吻的视频

translation.en: and they used a cupcake to show how to kiss.
translation.zh:
‎然后他们用了一个杯子蛋糕
‎来展示该如何接吻

translation.en: So then she picked that up and started using that with boys.
translation.zh:
‎于是她学会了以后
‎开始在男孩身上用了起来

translation.en: But how do you do it?
translation.zh: ‎那你是怎么学的？

translation.en: Hold up a cupcake, like you're licking the icing.
translation.zh:
‎把杯子蛋糕举起来
‎就好像是你在舔糖霜一样

translation.en: [uncle] So romantic.
translation.zh: ‎真浪漫

translation.en: -[uncle] No. -[aunt and uncle laugh]
translation.zh: ‎够了

translation.en: [aunt] Okay, you're grossing out Uncle.
translation.zh: ‎好了 你把姨夫恶心到了

translation.en: [chuckles] Patrick, you're so sensitive.
translation.zh: ‎帕特里克 你真是太敏感了

translation.en: I'm Abbey, but my real name is Abigail, but people call me Abbey for short.
translation.zh:
‎我叫艾比 但我的真名是阿比盖尔
‎但人们把我简称为艾比

translation.en: -[Cian] You are on the spectrum, Abbey? -Yes.
translation.zh:
‎-你在谱系上吗 艾比？
‎-是的

translation.en: Speaking of, autism makes me feel like not human.
translation.zh:
‎说起这个
‎自闭症让我觉得自己不像人类

translation.en: [Cian] Why is that?
translation.zh: ‎为什么？

translation.en: I don't know. It's just because I feel like Ariel in The Little Mermaid.
translation.zh:
‎我也不知道 只不过我觉得
‎自己就像是《小美人鱼》里的爱丽儿

translation.en: When I can't get my words out, I feel like Ariel.
translation.zh:
‎当我没法把话说出口的时候
‎我觉得自己就像爱丽儿

translation.en: It's like how I want to be typical, Ariel wants to be a human.
translation.zh:
‎就像我很想成为标准人一样
‎爱丽儿想成为人类

translation.en: And she becomes human, she can't talk. That's how I feel.
translation.zh:
‎而在她变成人类后
‎又没办法说话了 这就是我的感受

translation.en: -[Abbey] Hey, Cian. -[Cian] Hey.
translation.zh:
‎-嘿 西恩
‎-嘿

translation.en: This is my room.
translation.zh: ‎这是我的房间

translation.en: A lot of stuff in it.
translation.zh: ‎里面有很多东西

translation.en: These are my lions and all that.
translation.zh: ‎这些是我的狮子啊什么的

translation.en: I love princesses, but I do not like the villains.
translation.zh: ‎我爱各种公主 但我不喜欢反派

translation.en: Villains are kind of…
translation.zh: ‎反派有点…

translation.en: I think more boys are interested in them.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得男生对他们比较感兴趣

translation.en: Girls seem to like stuffed animals and all that,
translation.zh: ‎女生似乎更喜欢毛绒玩具什么的

translation.en: and I bet the Disney princesses love stuffed animals.
translation.zh:
‎我打赌迪士尼的公主们
‎都很爱毛绒玩具

translation.en: [Cian] So, Abbey, are you looking for love? Yes.
translation.zh:
‎-那么 艾比 你在寻找爱情吗？
‎-是的

translation.en: 'Cause I wanna be like a princess, like Cinderella going to the ball.
translation.zh:
‎因为我想要像公主一样
‎像灰姑娘那样去参加舞会

translation.en: [Cian] And have you been in love before?
translation.zh: ‎你以前谈过恋爱吗？

translation.en: Yes, I have. In school, in high school.
translation.zh: ‎嗯 我谈过 在学校里 高中

translation.en: Being in love made me feel romantic.
translation.zh: ‎谈恋爱让我觉得很浪漫

translation.en: I felt safe, and it meant a lot to me.
translation.zh: ‎我感到安全 这对我来说很重要

translation.en: I'd like to go on a date with a boy who has things in common with me
translation.zh:
‎我想要与一个
‎跟我有很多共同点的男生约会

translation.en: is what I want, is the most important thing.
translation.zh: ‎这是我想要的 这点最重要

translation.en: So he could understand my autism.
translation.zh: ‎这样他就能理解我的自闭症

translation.en: We could do things. We could go to water parks.
translation.zh:
‎我们可以一起做很多事
‎我们可以去水上乐园

translation.en: We could go to the beach, the zoo.
translation.zh: ‎我们可以去海滩 去动物园

translation.en: Maybe we can go on a double date with another autistic couple.
translation.zh:
‎也许我们还可以跟另一对自闭症情侣
‎一起去四人约会

translation.en: Double date!
translation.zh: ‎四人约会！

translation.en: You're so cute! You're so cute!
translation.zh: ‎你好可爱！

translation.en: [narrator] Abbey lives with her mom, Christine, and her brother, Ben.
translation.zh:
‎艾比与她妈妈克里斯汀
‎还有他哥哥本一起生活

translation.en: Peel and then put it in there, okay?
translation.zh: ‎剥了然后放到那里面 好吗？

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: ‎好的

translation.en: -[Christine] This is messy. -This is a little bit complicated.
translation.zh: ‎这有点复杂啊

translation.en: This is a mess.
translation.zh: ‎真是一团糟

translation.en: Well, how can you clean it up, girl?
translation.zh: ‎那你要怎么弄干净呢 女儿？

translation.en: It's hard.
translation.zh: ‎很难

translation.en: I saw how Abbey was with her first boyfriend,
translation.zh: ‎我看了艾比跟她第一任男友如何相处

translation.en: and it was truly one of the most beautiful things.
translation.zh: ‎那绝对是世上最美丽的东西

translation.en: And I want that for her.
translation.zh: ‎我想让她再次拥有

translation.en: And I know she wants it, but she's a little scared.
translation.zh: ‎我知道她是想要的 但她有点害怕

translation.en: [Cian] When was Abbey diagnosed with autism?
translation.zh: ‎艾比是什么时候被诊断出自闭症的？

translation.en: [Christine] She was maybe two,
translation.zh: ‎当时她大概两岁吧

translation.en: and she was putting everything in her mouth, running around…
translation.zh:
‎她会把所有东西都塞进嘴里去
‎然后到处乱跑…

translation.en: It was a chore. I remember thinking, "I can't wait till this stage is over,
translation.zh:
‎真的很难照顾 我记得我会想：
‎“真是等不及让这个阶段过去了

translation.en: 'cause this is really awful."
translation.zh: ‎因为这实在太吃力了”

translation.en: But then I put her in a pre-- preschool
translation.zh: ‎可到了我送她去托儿所的时候

translation.en: and four days into it, the preschool called me and said…
translation.zh: ‎才去了四天 托儿所就打来说…

translation.en: [crying] "We can't have your kid in here."
translation.zh: ‎“我们这儿没办法收你的孩子了”

translation.en: So the journey began.
translation.zh: ‎于是 这段旅程就开始了

translation.en: I took her in, I got her diagnosed, and I didn't want to believe it.
translation.zh:
‎我把她领回家 给她做了诊断
‎我根本不愿意相信

translation.en: And on a good note,
translation.zh: ‎往好处想

translation.en: what she's doing now,
translation.zh: ‎她现在在做的事

translation.en: I could have never imagined she would be capable of doing.
translation.zh: ‎我做梦也想不到 她能有这个能力

translation.en: -Abbey, which one is that? -It's Moana.
translation.zh:
‎-艾比 你手上是哪个？
‎-莫阿娜啊

translation.en: -That's a Disney thing, right? -Uh-huh.
translation.zh:
‎-这是迪士尼的 对吧？
‎-嗯

translation.en: Oh, wonderful. Okay.
translation.zh: ‎噢 太棒了 好的

translation.en: -All right, how was your day today? -You know, it was great.
translation.zh:
‎-你今天过得怎么样？
‎-你知道吗 非常棒

translation.en: You know the actress who does the voice of Moana is Ben's age.
translation.zh:
‎你知道吗
‎给莫阿娜配音的女演员跟本一个年纪

translation.en: -[man] Okay. -[Cian] Who's this gentleman here, Abbey?
translation.zh:
‎-这样啊
‎-这位先生是谁啊 艾比？

translation.en: -This is Mike. -Yes.
translation.zh:
‎-这位是迈克
‎-是的

translation.en: He's like my stepfather. He has a husband named Bob.
translation.zh:
‎他就像是我的继父一样
‎他有个丈夫 名叫鲍勃

translation.en: They're together.
translation.zh: ‎他们在一起

translation.en: We live in the back.
translation.zh: ‎我们住在后头

translation.en: The guesthouse.
translation.zh: ‎客房

translation.en: [Mike] Dinner's ready.
translation.zh: ‎晚餐做好了

translation.en: Oh, Clemmy's here.
translation.zh: ‎噢 克莱米也来了

translation.en: She's waiting for--
translation.zh: ‎她在等…

translation.en: [Christine] She's waiting for us.
translation.zh: ‎她在等我们

translation.en: Anything that drops on the ground is Clem's, right?
translation.zh:
‎任何掉到地上的东西
‎都归小克的了 对吧？

translation.en: [Christine] So why don't you tell Bob and Mike what you're doing, Abbey?
translation.zh:
‎跟鲍勃和迈克介绍一下
‎你要干什么吧 艾比？

translation.en: -She is gonna start going out more, right? -[Abbey] Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-她要多往外头跑跑 对吧？
‎-是的

translation.en: [Christine] Maybe go on a few dates.
translation.zh: ‎或许去约个几次会

translation.en: -Where would be your dream place to go? -A cruise in Africa.
translation.zh:
‎-你最想去的地方是哪儿？
‎-去非洲坐游轮

translation.en: -[Christine] A cruise. -[Abbey] Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-游轮啊
‎-对

translation.en: -[Christine] I've not ever been-- -Mm, and an indoor water park.
translation.zh:
‎-我还从来没去…
‎-还有室内水上乐园

translation.en: It would be nice to see her go out with a nice boy.
translation.zh:
‎那样的话挺好的
‎她跟个好男孩去约会

translation.en: What do you think, Ben, about your sister going on a date?
translation.zh:
‎你对你妹妹出去约会
‎有什么看法呢 本？

translation.en: -[Ben] If she meets the right person… -[Christine] Right?
translation.zh:
‎-我觉得如果她能遇上对的人…
‎-嗯？

translation.en: …that'd be good. I still get those brotherly instincts once in a while.
translation.zh:
‎那样的话挺好的
‎我哥哥的本能偶尔还是会冒出来一下

translation.en: So what else do you want to find in a boyfriend?
translation.zh: ‎那你对男友还有什么别的要求吗？

translation.en: He needs to understand my autism.
translation.zh: ‎他需要理解我的自闭症

translation.en: And he'd have to be funny, like us.
translation.zh: ‎而且他还得很风趣 就像我俩一样

translation.en: -'Cause, you know… -And handsome, like someone at the table.
translation.zh:
‎-因为 你知道的…
‎-还得很英俊 就像在座的某人一样

translation.en: -[Christine laughs] -You guys!
translation.zh: ‎你们呀！

translation.en: -[Cian] Hello there. -Oh, yes, hello. How are you doing today?
translation.zh:
‎-你好啊
‎-哦 对 你好 你今天过得如何？

translation.en: My name is James. I am 34 years old.
translation.zh: ‎我叫詹姆斯 今年34岁

translation.en: I have Asperger's syndrome. I do not allow it to limit me.
translation.zh:
‎我有阿斯伯格综合症
‎我不允许让它限制住我

translation.en: It does not define me, and yes, I am seeking love.
translation.zh:
‎这件事无法定义我
‎然后呢 没错 我在寻找爱情

translation.en: I'm seeking to find a partner, you know, a soul mate
translation.zh:
‎我想要找到我的另一半
‎你知道的 一个灵魂伴侣

translation.en: with whom I can spend my life.
translation.zh: ‎与其共度一生

translation.en: At the time that I was diagnosed,
translation.zh: ‎我被确诊的那个年代

translation.en: society did not have a great understanding of Asperger's syndrome or autism,
translation.zh:
‎社会对于阿斯伯格综合症
‎或是自闭症都不太了解

translation.en: so, sadly, help-- It was difficult to find help.
translation.zh:
‎所以 很可惜的是帮助…
‎很难找到帮助

translation.en: Mm, as sad as it is, other students mocked me and bullied me.
translation.zh:
‎这样已经够令人难过的了
‎其他学生还会嘲笑我 霸凌我

translation.en: That did have an effect on my self-esteem.
translation.zh: ‎这些事确实影响了我的自尊心

translation.en: I would always be terribly nervous being in large crowds
translation.zh:
‎一来到一大群人中
‎我就会感到非常紧张

translation.en: or being outside my house for any significant duration.
translation.zh: ‎如果离开我家很长时间也会这样

translation.en: With practice, though, I overcame that.
translation.zh: ‎但是通过练习 我克服了这一点

translation.en: Now I have no problem at all, becoming more confident
translation.zh:
‎现在我完全没有这方面的问题 ‎在其他人周围 在一大群人中
‎也变得更加自信

translation.en: in being around other people, being in large crowds.
translation.zh:
‎在其他人周围 在一大群人中
‎也变得更加自信

translation.en: [narrator] James lives with his family in Massachusetts.
translation.zh:
‎詹姆斯同他的家人一起
‎住在马萨诸塞州

translation.en: All these stones I have over here are certainly not for any practical use,
translation.zh:
‎我这里收藏的这些石头
‎确实没有什么实际的用途

translation.en: but they're interesting conversation pieces.
translation.zh: ‎但可以作为谈资

translation.en: They add character to the room.
translation.zh: ‎它们给这个房间增添了个性

translation.en: This here is a type of glass called fulgurite.
translation.zh: ‎这块是一种叫做闪电熔岩的玻璃

translation.en: It happens when lightning strikes sand.
translation.zh: ‎是闪电击中沙子后形成的

translation.en: This is a preserved alligator head from Louisiana.
translation.zh:
‎这是一个来自路易斯安那州的
‎鳄鱼头颅标本

translation.en: Isn't that something?
translation.zh: ‎是不是很有意思啊？

translation.en: I have a Japanese katana and a European longsword.
translation.zh:
‎我还有一把日本武士刀
‎和一把欧洲长剑

translation.en: This is a cheap display unit.
translation.zh: ‎这是一件便宜的展示品

translation.en: This one could not be used in battle,
translation.zh: ‎这把是不能在战斗中使用的

translation.en: but this sword is actually fully functional.
translation.zh: ‎而这一把剑是完全可用的

translation.en: I got it at King Richard's Faire from one of their blacksmiths,
translation.zh:
‎我是在理查一世集会上
‎问一个铁匠买来的

translation.en: and the blacksmiths there assured me
translation.zh: ‎那个铁匠向我保证

translation.en: that everything they forge, though, is fully functional.
translation.zh: ‎他们锻造的一切 都是完全可用的

translation.en: So, yes, I mean, in the rare chance I ever had to use it in battle, I could.
translation.zh:
‎所以是的 万一真让我遇上了
‎需要用它来战斗的情况 还是能用的

translation.en: "A good friend will bail you out of jail,
translation.zh: ‎“一个好朋友会把你从监狱里赎出来

translation.en: but a true friend will be sitting next to you saying,
translation.zh: ‎但真朋友会坐在你身旁说：

translation.en: 'Damn, that was fun!'"
translation.zh: ‎‘妈的 刚才可真好玩！’”

translation.en: Yes, I really like that plaque a lot, and…
translation.zh: ‎是的 我很喜欢这块匾 然后…

translation.en: Oh, these are stamps with classic movie monsters.
translation.zh: ‎噢 这边是经典电影中怪物的邮票

translation.en: These are stamps with classic American aircraft.
translation.zh: ‎这些是经典美国飞机的邮票

translation.en: I'm never going to use them.
translation.zh: ‎我永远不会拿来用的

translation.en: I'm just keeping those there as conversation pieces.
translation.zh: ‎我只是把它们放在这儿作为谈资

translation.en: [Cian] Who comes in here for the conversation pieces?
translation.zh: ‎进来看这些谈资的都有谁呢？

translation.en: Um, actually, nobody really.
translation.zh: ‎其实 也没有人进来

translation.en: This is… It's just… I guess it's for my own benefit.
translation.zh: ‎这是…我想这些是为了我自己吧

translation.en: I've made myself accounts on various online dating services.
translation.zh:
‎我在各种网络相亲网站上
‎都创建了账号

translation.en: There have been times where I… match with… with a… with a woman on the site,
translation.zh:
‎我确实有在网站上
‎数次跟女性配对成功过

translation.en: and none of them have ever agreed to meet me in person,
translation.zh: ‎但她们都不同意跟我在线下见面

translation.en: as sad as that is.
translation.zh: ‎这点挺让人伤心的

translation.en: Oh, yeah, see?
translation.zh: ‎对了 你看到没？

translation.en: This cane here
translation.zh: ‎这根手杖

translation.en: is made out of bullet casings that have been welded together.
translation.zh: ‎是用子弹壳焊在一起做成的

translation.en: Pretty cool, wouldn't you say?
translation.zh: ‎挺酷的 你说对不对？

translation.en: Show them the cane that belonged to your great-grandfather.
translation.zh: ‎给他们看看你曾祖父的那根手杖

translation.en: This one?
translation.zh: ‎这根吗？

translation.en: Oh, yes, this belonged to one of my ancestors.
translation.zh: ‎哦 对 这根是属于我的一位先祖的

translation.en: -He died in 1943. -Okay.
translation.zh:
‎-他是1943年去世的
‎-好的

translation.en: This is my father, Lawrence.
translation.zh: ‎这位是我的父亲 劳伦斯

translation.en: -[Lawrence] Where's Mom? -Oh.
translation.zh: ‎妈妈人呢？

translation.en: -Come on over, Mom. -[James] Oh.
translation.zh: ‎快过来 妈妈

translation.en: -Hello. -[James] Uh, yes.
translation.zh:
‎-你好
‎-是的

translation.en: -This is my mother, June. -[June] How are you doing?
translation.zh:
‎-这位是我妈妈 琼
‎-你们好吗？

translation.en: -I'm feeling slightly nervous. -Can I sit?
translation.zh:
‎-我有点紧张
‎-我能坐下来吗？

translation.en: Of course. Oh, yes, that's right, Mom, King Richard's Faire will be open soon.
translation.zh:
‎当然了 哦 对 妈妈
‎理查一世集会很快就要开始了

translation.en: Yeah! You were telling me. Wanna sit?
translation.zh: ‎是啊！想坐下来吗？

translation.en: -I'm gonna invite my friends. -What are you going to wear?
translation.zh:
‎-我要邀请朋友们去理查一世集会
‎-你打算穿什么去？

translation.en: Oh, yes, I'll wear my full… all my medieval regalia, as I so often do.
translation.zh:
‎哦 我要穿我全套的中世纪服饰
‎就像我平常那样

translation.en: -[Cian] Can you show it to us? -[groans]
translation.zh: ‎能穿给我们看看吗？

translation.en: I guess so. Please wait a moment.
translation.zh: ‎可以吧 请稍等片刻

translation.en: -[chuckles] -Okay, so how does this look?
translation.zh: ‎好吧 这身看起来怎么样？

translation.en: -Isn't that something? -[Lawrence] Yeah. That's great.
translation.zh:
‎-是不是很有意思？
‎-是啊 很棒

translation.en: -Now, you need a cane, a formal cane. -[June] Don't you have your own cane?
translation.zh: ‎-好了 你需要手杖 一根正经的手杖

translation.en: -What about this one? -Yeah, that's good.
translation.zh:
‎-这根怎么样？
‎-不错

translation.en: Yes. [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎是的

translation.en: What do you think?
translation.zh: ‎你们觉得呢？

translation.en: [June] It goes great with your dungarees!
translation.zh: ‎这根很配你的工装裤

translation.en: Oh, mm, yeah, well, I don't have time to change into all the clothing, you know,
translation.zh: ‎哦 是啊 我没时间换上一整套衣服

translation.en: but it's still pretty cool, isn't it?
translation.zh: ‎但这还是挺酷的 不是吗？

translation.en: -[June] It's very cool. -Yes.
translation.zh:
‎-非常酷
‎-是的

translation.en: Yes. I'm going to put these away.
translation.zh: ‎嗯 我去把这些收起来

translation.en: -Please wait a moment. -[Lawrence] Okay.
translation.zh:
‎-请稍等片刻
‎-好的

translation.en: All right. Please wait a moment.
translation.zh: ‎好嘞 请稍等片刻

translation.en: He's a very family-oriented young man,
translation.zh: ‎他是个非常以家庭为中心的年轻人

translation.en: and, uh, uh… we want… we want the best for him, you know.
translation.zh: ‎然后 我们想给他最好的 你知道的

translation.en: Like any parent does.
translation.zh: ‎可怜天下父母心

translation.en: He's got a very… a very kind heart. Um…
translation.zh: ‎他的心肠很善良

translation.en: He would do anything for a friend or family.
translation.zh: ‎为了朋友和家人 他什么都愿意做

translation.en: We can't wait to see you with a lovely lady.
translation.zh:
‎我们等不及想见到你
‎找到一位可爱的女士

translation.en: -Oh, yes. Thank you very much. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎噢 是的 非常感谢

translation.en: [June] You know what?
translation.zh: ‎你猜怎么着？

translation.en: We love your hair, James,
translation.zh: ‎我们很喜欢你的头发 詹姆斯

translation.en: but I think, because of the two different colors,
translation.zh: ‎但我觉得 因为你有两种不同的颜色

translation.en: it might be a really good idea to professionally have it cut and colored.
translation.zh:
‎可能找专业人士剪一下
‎染个色会比较好

translation.en: I do plan to do that.
translation.zh: ‎我确实有在打算要这么做

translation.en: That way, when you first meet someone, you're gonna make a better impression.
translation.zh:
‎那样你跟别人初次见面的时候
‎也可以留下一个更好的印象

translation.en: [James] Yes. Yes, of course.
translation.zh: ‎是的 当然了

translation.en: You know, as a young man, it's expected of you to attract a young lady, okay?
translation.zh:
‎作为一位年轻男士 ‎应该由你来主动吸引年轻女士
‎明白吗？

translation.en: And without looking at your watch all the time. -[groans] -You know?
translation.zh: ‎不要一直盯着你的手表看 知道吗？

translation.en: I'm sorry. Well, I am glad I'm so young from your perspective.
translation.zh:
‎对不起嘛 我很高兴
‎在你看来我还是这么年轻

translation.en: You're in competition with all the other young men
translation.zh: ‎你要跟这么其他的多年轻男士竞争啊

translation.en: who are trying to pair up -with a young lady, okay? -Yes.
translation.zh:
‎他们都在争先恐后地
‎想找个年轻女士呢 知道吗？

translation.en: So, it's important for you to make yourself -attractable, okay? -[James] Yes, I know that.
translation.zh:
‎所以这点很重要
‎必须要让自己有吸引力 明白吗？

translation.en: [Cian] So, James, we've got a date lined up for you on Saturday.
translation.zh:
‎詹姆斯
‎我们周六给你安排了一场约会

translation.en: -Oh, really? That's pretty great. -[June] Oh, wow!
translation.zh:
‎哦 是吗？ ‎-那可真是太棒了
‎-噢 哇喔！

translation.en: Do I get to come to the restaurant and hide and peek and watch?
translation.zh:
‎我能不能也到餐厅里来
‎躲在角落里看啊？

translation.en: Give me a break, Mom. I'm 34, okay?
translation.zh: ‎放过我吧 妈妈 我都34岁了 好吗？

translation.en: I'm kidding. I'm kidding, sweetie.
translation.zh: ‎我开玩笑的 亲爱的

translation.en: [Christine] Clementine, do you need a treat again?
translation.zh: ‎克莱门汀 ‎你又要吃零食啦？

translation.en: This dog could eat all day long.
translation.zh: ‎这条狗整天就知道吃东西

translation.en: Is she gonna be a fat dog?
translation.zh: ‎她会变成一条肥狗吗？

translation.en: This is LA. You cannot be a fat dog in Los Angeles.
translation.zh:
‎这可是洛城
‎在洛杉矶做一条肥狗可没出路

translation.en: [Cian] What's the hardest thing about dating?
translation.zh: ‎你觉得谈恋爱最困难的事是什么？

translation.en: You have to talk to your boyfriend a lot, and that can be hard for me.
translation.zh: ‎你必须要经常跟男友说话 ‎这对我来说可能有困难

translation.en: Like when I was dating Garrett, he was kind of…
translation.zh:
‎比如当初我跟加勒特交往的时候
‎他有点…

translation.en: He was interested in history, and I wasn't.
translation.zh: ‎他对历史感兴趣 可我不是

translation.en: But he did like Star Wars, and I like Star Wars.
translation.zh:
‎但他很喜欢《星球大战》
‎我也喜欢《星球大战》

translation.en: We had that in common.
translation.zh: ‎至少有这么个共同点

translation.en: [narrator] Autism expert Jennifer Cook is visiting Abbey
translation.zh:
‎自闭症专家詹妮弗·库克
‎正要去拜访艾比

translation.en: to help her in her search for love.
translation.zh: ‎为她寻找爱情提供帮助

translation.en: I was identified as being on the spectrum about ten years ago,
translation.zh: ‎大约十年前 我被确认处于谱系上

translation.en: and it made everything beforehand in my life make sense.
translation.zh:
‎这使我之前人生中的一切
‎都解释得通了

translation.en: [Abbey] Hi.
translation.zh: ‎嗨

translation.en: -Hi, I'm Jennifer. -Hi, I'm Abbey.
translation.zh:
‎-嗨 我是詹妮弗
‎-嗨 我是艾比

translation.en: -Nice to meet you. -Nice to meet you too.
translation.zh:
‎-很高兴认识你
‎-我也是

translation.en: [Jennifer] Autism really means it's a constellation of behaviors and challenges and aptitudes,
translation.zh:
‎自闭症其实是一系列的
‎行为、困难与天资

translation.en: but we're all dealing with sensory sensitivities.
translation.zh: ‎可我们所有人都要面对感官过敏

translation.en: We're all dealing with challenges with social cues.
translation.zh: ‎都会在察言观色上面临挑战

translation.en: -Hi. I'm Jennifer. -Hi, Jennifer. I'm Christine.
translation.zh:
‎-嗨 我是詹妮弗
‎-嗨 詹妮弗 我是克里斯汀

translation.en: -Nice to meet you, Christine. -Nice to meet you. Welcome.
translation.zh:
‎-很高兴认识你
‎-很高兴认识你 欢迎你来

translation.en: But I can promise that what's going on in the inside
translation.zh: ‎但我可以保证 内心在想的东西

translation.en: often has nothing to do with what's shown on the outside.
translation.zh: ‎往往与表现出来的完全不一样

translation.en: [Abbey] Your hair reminds me of Ariel in The Little Mermaid.
translation.zh:
‎你的头发让我想起了
‎《小美人鱼》里的爱丽儿

translation.en: -Thank you. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你

translation.en: I really understand Ariel,
translation.zh: ‎我很能理解爱丽儿

translation.en: because when she was singing her "Part of Your World" song,
translation.zh:
‎因为当她在唱
‎她那首《你世界的一部分》时

translation.en: she couldn't get the words out.
translation.zh: ‎她没办法开口

translation.en: And when I can't get my words out, I feel exactly like that.
translation.zh:
‎而当我没办法开口说话时
‎我跟她的感觉一模一样

translation.en: That's why I like her so much.
translation.zh: ‎所以我才这么喜欢她

translation.en: -Abbey, you want to know something? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-你想知道一个秘密吗？
‎-想

translation.en: I'm on the spectrum too.
translation.zh: ‎我也在谱系上

translation.en: -I have autism too. [chuckles] -[gasps] Ooh.
translation.zh: ‎我也有自闭症

translation.en: And all three of my kids do too.
translation.zh: ‎而且我的三个孩子也都有

translation.en: So how could you have kids if you're on the spectrum?
translation.zh:
‎可是如果你在谱系上的话
‎你怎么会有孩子啊？

translation.en: -You can do anything you want to. -[Christine] It's up to the individual.
translation.zh:
‎-你想做什么就可以做什么
‎-完全取决于你自己

translation.en: -It has nothing to do with autism. -Exactly.
translation.zh:
‎-自闭症不影响这个
‎-没错

translation.en: -Exactly right. I know that's-- -Do you take pills?
translation.zh:
‎完全正确 ‎-我知道…
‎-你吃药吗？

translation.en: -You know what? I do. -Hmm.
translation.zh: ‎你猜怎么着？我吃

translation.en: -[Jennifer] I do take medicine. Mm-hmm. -Do they make pills for pets?
translation.zh: ‎我是会吃药的 ‎他们会给宠物做药吗？

translation.en: They do make pills for pets.
translation.zh: ‎他们会给宠物做药

translation.en: [Christine] We can take left turns in the conversation.
translation.zh: ‎我们讲话时话 总是会急转弯

translation.en: -I know. I know. -So I'm just giving you that heads-up.
translation.zh:
‎-可不是嘛
‎-我想先给你打个预防针

translation.en: No, I get it, and that's okay.
translation.zh: ‎不 我理解的 这样没关系

translation.en: Do you like Mike Myers?
translation.zh: ‎你喜欢迈克·迈尔斯吗？

translation.en: -[Jennifer] I've never met him. -Me neither.
translation.zh:
‎-我没见过他本人
‎-我也没

translation.en: -What were you thinking about before? -[Abbey] I don't know.
translation.zh:
‎-你之前在想什么？
‎-我不知道

translation.en: -It just popped into my head. -Okay. That's fine. That's fine.
translation.zh:
‎-只是突然想到而已
‎-好的 ‎没关系

translation.en: Tell me about your dating history.
translation.zh: ‎跟我说说你的恋爱史吧

translation.en: Dated a boy named Garrett in high school.
translation.zh: ‎高中时跟一个叫加勒特的男生交往过

translation.en: -Okay. -[Abbey] I loved it.
translation.zh:
‎-好的
‎-我很喜欢

translation.en: -[Jennifer] Okay. -I had fun.
translation.zh:
‎-好的
‎-我谈得很开心

translation.en: So when you're going on a date,
translation.zh: ‎那么当你去约会时

translation.en: what you're really doing is you're trying to make a friend, okay?
translation.zh:
‎你要做的事
‎其实就是在想办法交朋友

translation.en: We want to ask questions as well as give answers.
translation.zh:
‎好吗？我们要提出问题 同时还要… ‎给出一些回答
‎我知道有些话题是你喜欢聊的

translation.en: And there are some things that I know you like to talk about
translation.zh:
‎给出一些回答
‎我知道有些话题是你喜欢聊的

translation.en: and some things that maybe your date would like to talk about.
translation.zh:
‎而还有些话题
‎是你的约会对象喜欢聊的 那么

translation.en: So what are the things that you like to talk about the most, do you think?
translation.zh:
‎而还有些话题
‎是你的约会对象喜欢聊的 那么 ‎你都喜欢聊些什么东西呢？

translation.en: Candy Crush.
translation.zh: ‎《糖果传奇》

translation.en: -Okay. -[Abbey] Going to the zoo.
translation.zh:
‎-好的
‎-去动物园

translation.en: [Jennifer] Great.
translation.zh: ‎很好

translation.en: I like watching African safari animals and sea animals.
translation.zh: ‎我喜欢看非洲野生动物和海洋动物

translation.en: -Documentaries… -[Jennifer] I love documentaries.
translation.zh:
‎-纪录片…
‎-我可爱纪录片了

translation.en: …about wild animals.
translation.zh: ‎关于野生动物的

translation.en: Cool, so what we want to do is,
translation.zh: ‎很好 我们想要做的是

translation.en: if this is sort of like your conversation during your date,
translation.zh:
‎如果你约会的时候
‎喜欢聊的是这些话题

translation.en: then what you want to do is make sure that we leave enough room
translation.zh:
‎那你想要做的
‎是确保我们留下足够的时间

translation.en: for what your date might want to talk about, so maybe your date…
translation.zh:
‎给你的约会对象聊他想聊的事
‎所以也许你的约会对象…

translation.en: Let's come up with some things that he likes to talk about.
translation.zh: ‎我们来想一些他想要聊的事

translation.en: Maybe he likes to talk about music, gaming.
translation.zh: ‎也许他喜欢聊音乐 ‎游戏

translation.en: -[Abbey] Video games? -[Jennifer] Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: ‎电子游戏？

translation.zh:
‎-看来你也喜欢电子游戏啊 嗯？
‎-《糖果传奇》也算是电子游戏

translation.en: You just did something really good.
translation.zh: ‎你刚刚做了一件很棒很棒的事

translation.en: -Do you know what you did? -What?
translation.zh:
‎-知道你做了什么吗？
‎-什么？

translation.en: You just found your first common interest, because if this is your conversation,
translation.zh: ‎你刚刚找到了你们的第一个共同兴趣 ‎假如这就是你们的对话

translation.en: you gotta make sure that, with all that you want to talk about,
translation.zh:
‎你必须要确保
‎在聊完了你想聊的东西后

translation.en: we have to make sure there's room in the air
translation.zh: ‎我们必须要确保 留有足够的空间

translation.en: for somebody else's words too.
translation.zh: ‎让别人也能说上话

translation.en: Come on over here with me on the floor. I'll sit over here.
translation.zh:
‎过来跟我一起坐到地上来
‎我坐在这边

translation.en: Perfect. So I'm gonna roll this to you, but I'm gonna roll a bunch of them.
translation.zh:
‎完美 我要把这个滚过来给你
‎但我要滚好几个

translation.en: -Ready? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-准备好了吗？
‎-嗯

translation.en: So what do you like to do?
translation.zh: ‎那你都喜欢做什么啊？

translation.en: -What's your favorite color? -My favorite--
translation.zh:
‎-你最喜欢什么颜色？
‎-我最喜欢…

translation.en: -Do you like dogs? -Yes. My favorite color's--

‎-你喜欢狗吗？
‎-喜欢 我最喜欢的颜色是…

translation.en: -What'll you do tomorrow? -That's a lot of questions.

‎-你明天要做什么啊？
‎-问了好多问题哦

translation.en: It is a lot of questions!
translation.zh: ‎确实问了好多问题！

translation.en: When somebody asks you a lot of questions like that,
translation.zh: ‎当别人像这样一下子问你好多问题时

translation.en: it's hard to figure them out and listen to what they're saying,
translation.zh:
‎你很难听明白 很难听懂
‎他们想说什么 这就意味着

translation.en: which means I didn't get to know anything about Abbey.
translation.zh:
‎你很难听明白 很难听懂
‎他们想说什么 这就意味着 ‎我根本没有机会了解艾比

translation.en: -Right? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-对吧？
‎-是啊

translation.en: Okay, so let's try something different.
translation.zh: ‎好的 那我们来试个别的问法

translation.en: Will you roll the balls back at me?
translation.zh: ‎你把球滚回来给我好吗？

translation.en: What's your favorite thing to do?
translation.zh: ‎你最喜欢做什么？

translation.en: I like to play with my dog.
translation.zh: ‎我喜欢和我的狗玩

translation.en: What's your favorite thing to do?
translation.zh: ‎你最喜欢做什么？

translation.en: Work out and swim.
translation.zh: ‎健身和游泳

translation.en: Roll it back to me. Okay, great.
translation.zh: ‎滚回来给我 好的 真棒

translation.en: -What do you like best about swimming? -'Cause mermaids swim.
translation.zh:
‎-你最喜欢游泳的什么？
‎-因为美人鱼会游泳

translation.en: I don't wanna go too far. There's dangerous animals.
translation.zh:
‎我不想要游得太远
‎不然有很危险的动物

translation.en: Roll it back. Good answer.
translation.zh: ‎滚回来 你已经回答得很好了

translation.en: Yeah, that's true. Sharks can be scary, right?
translation.zh:
‎没错 确实如此
‎鲨鱼是挺吓人的 对吧？

translation.en: Speaking of sharks, I've been watching a movie called Soul Surfer.
translation.zh:
‎说起鲨鱼 我最近看了部电影
‎叫《灵魂冲浪人》

translation.en: Tell me more about that.
translation.zh: ‎再跟我说说

translation.en: About a girl was surfing with her friend, and a shark bit her arm off.
translation.zh:
‎有个女孩跟朋友一起冲浪的时候
‎被一条鲨鱼咬断了她的手臂

translation.en: Bethany Hamilton.
translation.zh: ‎贝瑟妮·汉密尔顿

translation.en: Yes. I saw her.
translation.zh: ‎嗯 我见过她

translation.en: She did amazing things all around the world,
translation.zh: ‎她在世界各地都做了不少了不起的事

translation.en: even though she had one arm.
translation.zh: ‎尽管她只有一条手臂

translation.en: How?
translation.zh: ‎怎么做到的？

translation.en: Well, I think a lot of determination. Do you think so?
translation.zh:
‎这个嘛 我觉得是靠很大的决心
‎你觉得是这样吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Do you know what you just did?
translation.zh:
‎-是啊
‎-你知道你刚才做了什么吗？

translation.en: -What? -You just had a conversation with me.
translation.zh:
‎-什么？
‎-你刚刚跟我完成了一次对话

translation.en: -Oh my gosh! -[Jennifer laughs]
translation.zh: ‎我的天啊！

translation.en: You stayed on the topic. That made perfect sense to me.
translation.zh: ‎你一直没有跑题 我也全听懂了

translation.en: And we talked about it together.
translation.zh: ‎我们一起把这个聊天完成了

translation.en: May I shake your hand?
translation.zh: ‎我可以跟你握个手吗？

translation.en: -Yes! -Yes!
translation.zh:
‎-可以！
‎-可以！

translation.en: -Yes! -That was awesome.
translation.zh:
‎-太好了！
‎-刚才太棒了

translation.en: Abbey's primary challenge, I think, is going to be staying in the moment.
translation.zh:
‎我觉得艾比最主要的挑战
‎是怎么把握住当下

translation.en: She's changing topic because her mind is catching so much interest.
translation.zh:
‎她会一直改变话题
‎因为她的大脑一直在被各种兴趣吸引

translation.en: It's being able to put words to that
translation.zh: ‎能够用语言组织好说出口

translation.en: in a way which also brings the other person along,
translation.zh: ‎让对方也能一同感受这个过程

translation.en: so if she can do that,
translation.zh: ‎如果她能做到这一点的话

translation.en: then all of her flight of thought
translation.zh: ‎那她脑中飞快的思绪

translation.en: is actually gonna be great and interesting and fun
translation.zh:
‎就会变得非常棒
‎非常引人入胜和好玩

translation.en: and make for a great date.
translation.zh: ‎会让约会大获成功的

translation.en: It was really nice to meet you.
translation.zh: ‎很高兴认识你

translation.en: [Abbey] It was really nice to meet you too.
translation.zh: ‎也很高兴认识你

translation.en: [Jennifer] Thank you very much.
translation.zh: ‎非常感谢你

translation.en: -Thank you. -Thank you.
translation.zh:
‎-谢谢你
‎-谢谢你

translation.en: -It was great to meet you. -Yeah, really nice to meet you too.
translation.zh:
‎-认识你真的很高兴
‎-认识你我也很高兴

translation.en: -Thank you so much. -I can't wait to hear how it all goes.
translation.zh:
‎-实在太谢谢你了
‎-我等不及想知道约会得如何了

translation.en: Bye.
translation.zh: ‎再见

translation.en: Bye.
translation.zh: ‎再见

translation.en: Thanks again.
translation.zh: ‎再次感谢

translation.en: Okay, Abbey, do you want a sandwich?
translation.zh: ‎好了 艾比 你想吃个三明治吗？

translation.en: Animation is my greatest passion. [Cian] Tell me about your company.
translation.zh:
‎-动画是我最大的爱好
‎-那跟我说说你的动画公司吧

translation.en: I got the inspiration from Satoshi Tajiri, the creator of Pokémon.
translation.zh:
‎我受到了宝可梦的创作者
‎田尻智的启发

translation.en: And he's on the autism spectrum, which is amazing.
translation.zh: ‎他也在自闭症谱系上 这点非常棒

translation.en: He started his company, Game Freak, when he was 17,
translation.zh:
‎他17岁时创立了他的公司
‎“游戏狂想家”

translation.en: so I started my animation company at age 14.
translation.zh: ‎所以我在14岁时创立了我的动画公司

translation.en: It was fully launched with the help of my…
translation.zh: ‎公司已经完全运作起来了 多亏我的…

translation.en: with my aunt and uncle.
translation.zh: ‎我姨妈和姨夫的帮助

translation.en: [Cian] So you teach animation to people on the spectrum?
translation.zh: ‎你教在谱系上的人制作动画 对吧？

translation.en: That is true. It's good to see their work shine.
translation.zh:
‎没错
‎见到他们的作品发光发亮真的很棒

translation.en: -[Dani] Ready? -[Cian] I'm ready.
translation.zh:
‎-准备好了吗？
‎-我准备好了

translation.en: This is my office.
translation.zh: ‎这里 就是我的办公室

translation.en: Right here is my collection of all kinds of achievements
translation.zh: ‎这边就是我过去几年来所取得的

translation.en: that I've, um, earned over these years.
translation.zh: ‎这边就是我过去几年来所取得的  ‎各种成就的收藏集

translation.en: These are the flyers that I passed out when I was at San Diego Comic-Con.
translation.zh: ‎这些是我去圣迭戈漫展时分发的传单

translation.en: [high-pitched voice] "Hi, everybody. Mindy Da Vinci Lavender here."
translation.zh:
‎大家好呀
‎我是明迪·达·芬奇·薰衣草

translation.en: That's Mindy's voice. She's named after my dog,
translation.zh:
‎这是明迪的声音
‎她是以我狗的名字命名的

translation.en: and her personality is pretty much based upon my optimistic, happy self.
translation.zh:
‎她的性格基本上是根据
‎我开朗乐观的一面创作的

translation.en: Best of all, there's even Bachelor's of Fine Arts,
translation.zh:
‎最棒的在这里
‎甚至还有艺术学士学位

translation.en: Master's of Business Administration.
translation.zh: ‎工商管理硕士学位

translation.en: The more awards I get, I think I need a bigger house.
translation.zh:
‎我获得的奖项越多…
‎我觉得我需要一个更大的房子

translation.en: My ideal partner would be somebody who is running another company.
translation.zh:
‎我理想中的另一半
‎是一个经营着另一家公司的人

translation.en: Not only we see each other like lovers, but also work partners.
translation.zh:
‎我们不仅把对方当做情人
‎还要是工作上的伙伴

translation.en: [Cian] So it sounds like you want your love life and your work life to almost be entwined.
translation.zh:
‎听起来你似乎是想让你的情感生活
‎与你的工作生活交织在一起

translation.en: Into one.
translation.zh: ‎缠绕在一起

translation.en: Like a helix of a DNA structure.
translation.zh: ‎就像是DNA的螺旋结构

translation.en: [narrator] In Hollywood, Dani is meeting her good friend Devin for a drink.
translation.zh:
‎丹妮找了她的好友戴文
‎约在好莱坞一起喝上一杯

translation.en: Bonjour.
translation.zh: ‎你好

translation.en: Oh, hey, how are you?
translation.zh: ‎噢 嘿 你好吗？

translation.en: Nice to see you.
translation.zh: ‎见到你真高兴啊

translation.en: -How are you? -Good, fine, thank you so much, Devin.
translation.zh:
‎-你好吗？
‎-我好的 挺好的 谢谢你 戴文

translation.en: Wow, this place is like… it reminds me of art, of France.
translation.zh:
‎哇喔 这个地方就像…
‎这让我想起了法国的艺术品

translation.en: But did you know in France,
translation.zh: ‎但你知不知道在法国

translation.en: they have the biggest animation festival in the whole world?
translation.zh: ‎他们有个全世界最大的动画节？

translation.en: You talk about animation nonstop.
translation.zh: ‎你一张嘴就聊动画的事

translation.en: It's so funny.
translation.zh: ‎真是太好笑了

translation.en: I want to hear about your dating life.
translation.zh: ‎我想听听你的情感生活来着

translation.en: -Okay. -How has that been going?
translation.zh:
‎-好吧
‎-你那方面怎么样呀？

translation.en: I'm about to start dating again.
translation.zh: ‎我马上要重新开始谈恋爱了

translation.en: [Devin] I know. What made you decide to start dating again?
translation.zh:
‎是什么让你决定
‎要重新开始谈恋爱的呢？

translation.en: 'Cause the last real one was maybe a few years ago or…
translation.zh:
‎因为上一个认真谈的
‎好像是几年前的事了吧…

translation.en: Yeah, it's because, um… oh, I felt so lonely.
translation.zh: ‎是的 都是因为… ‎我觉得好孤独哦

translation.en: I'm stuck between a rock and a hard place.
translation.zh: ‎我所处的位置真是有点尴尬

translation.en: A lot of people on the autism spectrum think I'm too smart and too motivated,
translation.zh:
‎许多在自闭症谱系上的人
‎觉得我太聪明太有上进心了

translation.en: while neurotypicals think I'm too strange.
translation.zh: ‎而神经标准人却觉得我太奇怪了

translation.en: Just wanna be sure they're motivated enough and have a good sense of hygiene.
translation.zh:
‎只是想找一个有足够上进心
‎并且很讲卫生的人

translation.en: And you're looking for a guy with pretty much no facial hair, right?
translation.zh:
‎你想找的是一个
‎基本上完全没有胡子的男人 对吧？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎是的

translation.en: I take insult to that. What is wrong with facial hair?
translation.zh:
‎我感觉自己受侮辱了
‎有胡子又怎么啦？

translation.en: -I don't like the bushy stuff. -Oh my God!
translation.zh:
‎-我不喜欢毛茸茸的东西
‎-我的天呐！

translation.en: How has your dating life been?
translation.zh: ‎你最近的情感生活又如何呀？

translation.en: I got myself a fourth date coming up.
translation.zh: ‎我马上要去约第四次会了

translation.en: -[Dani] Oh, wow. -Same girl.
translation.zh: ‎同一个女孩

translation.en: This is fabulous.
translation.zh: ‎那可真是太棒了

translation.en: I know.
translation.zh: ‎可不是嘛

translation.en: What are you hoping, eventually, when you do find love?
translation.zh:
‎你希望最终修成什么正果啊
‎在你找到真爱后

translation.en: 'Cause I know it's gonna happen. Are you wanting to get married, have kids?
translation.zh:
‎因为我知道你肯定会找到的
‎你想要结婚生孩子吗？

translation.en: I've always wanted to get married and hopefully have a surrogate child.
translation.zh:
‎我一直都想要结婚
‎希望能有个代孕的孩子

translation.en: So you're not ever gonna get pregnant in your life?
translation.zh: ‎所以你这辈子是不打算怀孕了？

translation.en: Yeah, because I can imagine labor's gonna really hurt.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 因为我能想象分娩会有多么痛

translation.en: -Oh, thank you so much. -Thank you.
translation.zh:
‎-哎呀 真是太谢谢你了
‎-谢谢你

translation.en: Cheers to us autistic people
translation.zh: ‎为我们自闭症者干杯

translation.en: that are coming over leaps and bounds
translation.zh: ‎我们克服了艰难险阻

translation.en: through our crazy lives growing up, to now possibly one day finding love.
translation.zh: ‎从小到大经历了疯狂的生活 ‎到今天终于有可能找到爱情了

translation.en: Cheers. You find your Prince Charming.
translation.zh: ‎干杯 祝你找到你的白马王子

translation.en: I find my Cinderella. Bam!
translation.zh: ‎祝我找到我的灰姑娘 砰！

translation.en: Bam!
[narrator] Abbey is getting ready to step out on her first blind date.
translation.zh:
‎此时的艾比正在为她出门
‎进行第一次相亲做准备

translation.en: This is getting all over the place here.
translation.zh: ‎弄得到处都是

translation.en: -You're starting to look like Bette Davis. -No, I don't look like a witch.
translation.zh:
‎-你都有点像贝蒂·戴维斯了呢
‎-不 我看起来才不像女巫呢

translation.en: -It won't come off. It's like supersonic. -I want to look like a princess.
translation.zh:
‎-怎么也弄不下来 实在太难擦了
‎-我想看起来像个公主

translation.en: -[Christine] Come on, princess. -I want to look like a princess.
translation.zh:
‎-好的 来吧 公主
‎-我想看起来像个公主

translation.en: [Christine] Stand up. Look in the mirror.
translation.zh: ‎站起来 照照镜子

translation.en: What do you think?
translation.zh: ‎你觉得怎么样？

translation.en: Pretty good.
translation.zh: ‎挺好的

translation.en: Do a fashion pose.
translation.zh: ‎摆个时尚的造型看看

translation.en: -Are we ready to rock and roll? -[Abbey] Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-我们准备好摇滚起来了吗？
‎-是的

translation.en: -[Christine] Here we go. -[Abbey] Let's go. Ah!
translation.zh:
‎-我们走咯
‎-出发

translation.en: [man] Hey, western screech owl.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 西部鸣角鸮

translation.en: [narrator] Abbey is meeting David.
translation.zh: ‎艾比马上要跟大卫见面

translation.en: He likes lions
translation.zh: ‎他喜欢狮子

translation.en: and being in a car wash.
translation.zh: ‎还有坐在车里看洗车

translation.en: He doesn't like horror movies
translation.zh: ‎他不喜欢恐怖电影

translation.en: or clowns.
translation.zh: ‎还有小丑

translation.en: -[Abbey] Hey. -Hey.
Hey, it's nice to meet you. Oh, I like your shirt.
translation.zh:
‎嘿 很高兴认识你
‎噢 我好喜欢你的衬衫啊

translation.en: I see you have sharks on your shirt.
translation.zh: ‎我看到你衬衫上有鲨鱼

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你

translation.en: -That's so cool. What's your name? -David.
translation.zh:
‎-太酷了 你叫什么名字？
‎-大卫

translation.en: -Nice to meet you. -What's yours?
translation.zh:
‎-很高兴认识你
‎-你呢？

translation.en: -I'm Abbey. Nice to meet you. -Nice to meet you too, Abbey.
translation.zh:
‎-我叫艾比 很高兴认识你
‎-你也是 艾比

translation.en: It's so nice.
translation.zh: ‎太好了

translation.en: What's your favorite animal?
translation.zh: ‎你最喜欢什么动物？

translation.en: The African lion.
translation.zh: ‎非洲狮子

translation.en: [Abbey] Me too!
translation.zh: ‎我也是！

translation.en: You know they made a live-action version of The Lion King and… with Beyoncé?
translation.zh:
‎你知道他们制作了
‎真人版的《狮子王》吗？ ‎还有碧昂丝呢

translation.en: Wow, I did not know that.
translation.zh: ‎哇 我都不知道呢

translation.en: Yeah, she has an amazing voice.
translation.zh: ‎是的 她的声音很棒

translation.en: I've been to Africa, since winter break.
translation.zh: ‎我去过非洲 寒假的时候

translation.en: -You have? -Yes.
translation.zh:
‎-你去过啊？
‎-是的

translation.en: [Abbey] Oh, I'm so jealous.
translation.zh: ‎噢 我好嫉妒啊

translation.en: I want to go too.
translation.zh: ‎我也想去

translation.en: Going to Africa costs a lot of money.
translation.zh: ‎去非洲要花很多钱呢

translation.en: -It's too expensive. -[David] Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-太贵了
‎-是啊

translation.en: My mom can't afford it just yet. She doesn't have enough money.
translation.zh:
‎我妈现在还负担不起
‎她没有这么多钱

translation.en: I know, but she's working on it.
translation.zh: ‎可不是嘛 但她已经在努力了

translation.en: -If we're a billionaire… -Yeah. Mm-hmm.
translation.zh:
‎-假如我们是亿万富翁的话…
‎-是啊

translation.en: I was wondering, how old are you?
translation.zh: ‎我很好奇 你多大了？

translation.en: I'm 26. How about you?
translation.zh: ‎我26岁 你呢？

translation.en: -Twenty-three. -Wow.
-We're both in our twenties. -Yep.
translation.zh:
‎-我们俩都20多岁
‎-嗯

translation.en: You're not far from my age.
translation.zh: ‎你跟我年龄相差不大

translation.en: What's your favorite thing to get at In-N-Out?
translation.zh: ‎你最喜欢在In-N-Out汉堡点什么吃？

translation.en: Only a plain cheeseburger. What about you?
translation.zh: ‎普通的芝士汉堡而已 你呢？

translation.en: -I went to In-N-Out yesterday. -What did you like to get from In-N-Out?
translation.zh:
‎-我昨天去了In-N-Out
‎-你喜欢在In-N-Out点什么呢？

translation.en: I like the cheese fries, but I just don't eat them every day
translation.zh:
‎我喜欢他们的芝士薯条

translation.en: [Sandy] Yep.
translation.zh: ‎对

translation.en: Looks are a bonus, they're beautiful, but it can also be a bit seductive,
translation.zh:
‎外表是加分项 是很美好的
‎但有时也可能会有些诱人

translation.en: so I try to be very careful.
translation.zh: ‎所以我会尽量小心

translation.en: I always get attracted to some people with long hair, shoulder-length hair.
translation.zh:
‎我总会被一些长头发的人所吸引
‎那种披肩长发

translation.en: Especially some androgynous-looking guy, that I really love.
translation.zh:
‎尤其是那种兼具两性魅力外表的男生
‎我会特别喜欢

translation.en: [Cian] Do you find that sometimes you can find yourself attracted to someone,
translation.zh:
‎你会不会发现自己
‎有时候会被某人吸引

translation.en: but you think, "Hang on, Dani, that person isn't right for me 'cause--"
translation.zh:
‎但转念一想：
‎“等一下 这个人不适合我 因为…”

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎会啊

translation.en: He could be lazy or manipulative.
translation.zh: ‎他有可能很懒惰 或者爱操控别人

translation.en: Adjust my hair, adjust that.
translation.zh: ‎整理一下我的头发 整理整理

translation.en: [narrator] Dani is meeting Solomon.
translation.zh: ‎丹妮要见的是所罗门

translation.en: He likes writing poetry
translation.zh: ‎他喜欢写诗

translation.en: and good vibes.
translation.zh: ‎和正能量

translation.en: He doesn't like messy eaters
translation.zh: ‎他不喜欢吃东西不雅观的人

translation.en: or aggressive birds.
translation.zh: ‎和进攻性强的鸟

translation.en: -My name is Solomon. -I'm Dani. Nice to meet you.
translation.zh:
‎-我是所罗门
‎-我是丹妮 很高兴认识你

translation.en: Nice to meet you too.
translation.zh: ‎我也是

translation.en: -These are for you. -Oh, lovely flowers bouquet.
translation.zh:
‎-这是给你的
‎-噢 一束漂亮的花

translation.en: That's so wonderful. Thank you so much.
translation.zh: ‎真是太贴心了 非常感谢

translation.en: Any time.
translation.zh: ‎不客气

translation.en: So how are you doing?
translation.zh: ‎那么 你还好吗？

translation.en: I'm doing fine, great.
translation.zh: ‎我挺好的 非常好

translation.en: Sorry, I'm kind of nervous.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 我有点紧张

translation.en: -Yeah. -I'm nervous too.
translation.zh:
‎-是啊
‎-我也紧张的

translation.en: Yeah, so, um…
translation.zh: ‎嗯 那么…

translation.en: I'm sorry, I'm just kind of nervous.
translation.zh: ‎对不起 我只是有点紧张

translation.en: -Have you ever been on blind dates before? -I haven't, no.
translation.zh:
‎-你以前有没有相亲过？
‎-不 我没有

translation.en: Same here.
translation.zh: ‎我也是

translation.en: So what are your interests?
translation.zh: ‎那么 你都有什么兴趣啊？

translation.en: My interests, I do animation.
translation.zh: ‎我的兴趣啊 我是做动画的

translation.en: I teach animation to youth on the autism spectrum.
translation.zh: ‎我给在自闭症谱系上的年轻人教动画

translation.en: That's really cool. How long have you been doing that for?
translation.zh: ‎真是太酷了 你做这个多久了？

translation.en: I guess I've been doing animation ever since 14.
translation.zh: ‎我从14岁起就开始做动画了

translation.en: -A long time. -Wow.
translation.zh: ‎很久了

translation.en: -Fourteen? -Yep.
That's a good passion.
translation.zh: ‎这个爱好真不错

translation.en: Well, I just finished, you know, my AA degree at Santa Monica College.
translation.zh:
‎我刚刚在圣莫妮卡学院
‎完成了我的副学士学位

translation.en: [Dani] Oh, wow.
translation.zh: ‎噢 哇喔

translation.en: I'm majoring in Communication, like, Studies,
translation.zh: ‎我主修的是传播学

translation.en: so I'm gonna be working with kids, like, that have disabilities
translation.zh:
‎所以我的工作是跟孩子们一起
‎那些有残疾的

translation.en: and just teaching them, like, how to do the right stuff and--
translation.zh: ‎教他们如何做正确的事 然后…

translation.en: This is perfect.
translation.zh: ‎太完美了

translation.en: Yeah, yeah. I just want to teach them my perspective,
translation.zh:
‎是的 我只是想从我的角度
‎教会他们些东西

translation.en: and, like, what I went through, and how I became the person I am today.
translation.zh:
‎比如我的一些经历
‎我是如何成为今天的自己的

translation.en: And I got into the Law of Attraction. You know what that is?
translation.zh:
‎我研究起了吸引力法则来
‎你知道那是什么吗？

translation.en: Law of Attraction? What's this about?
translation.zh: ‎吸引力法则？是讲什么的？

translation.en: So it's about when you spread good vibes,
translation.zh: ‎就是说 当你在散播正能量的时候

translation.en: like, you attract that good energy and they give it back to you.
translation.zh:
‎你也会吸引那些好的能量
‎回到你自己身上

translation.en: [Dani] Oh, wow.
translation.zh: ‎噢 哇喔

translation.en: It's very powerful.
translation.zh: ‎这东西非常的强大

translation.en: I tried it with friends and family,
translation.zh: ‎我跟朋友和家人都试过了

translation.en: and my relationships are through the roof now.
translation.zh: ‎我的人际关系得到了极大的改善

translation.en: I really want to find my soul mate,
translation.zh: ‎我真的很想找到我的灵魂伴侣

translation.en: and that's why I started the Law of Attraction as well too,
translation.zh: ‎这也是我开始练习吸引力法则的原因

translation.en: to, like, actually, you know, find that abundance in my life, so…
translation.zh: ‎好让我找到生活中的丰盈 所以…

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你

translation.en: Thank you so much.
translation.zh: ‎非常感谢

translation.en: -[waitress] Of course. Enjoy. -Yeah, thank you.
translation.zh: ‎不客气 请慢用 ‎嗯 谢谢你

translation.en: Do you like anime?
translation.zh: ‎你喜欢动画吗？

translation.en: Yeah, I watch some of it. Not all the time though.
translation.zh: ‎嗯 我会看一些 但也不是经常看

translation.en: Have you ever been to San Diego Comic-Con?
translation.zh: ‎你有没有去参加过圣迭戈漫展？

translation.en: -I have, yeah. -[Dani] You did?!
translation.zh:
‎-嗯 我去过
‎-真的吗？

translation.en: Yeah, it's really nice.
translation.zh: ‎真的 很好玩

translation.en: Oh my goodness.
translation.zh: ‎我的天啊

translation.en: I gotta use the restroom for a second. Be right back.
translation.zh: ‎我要去一下洗手间 马上回来

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: ‎好的

translation.en: [Dani] What are your first impressions?
translation.zh: ‎你的第一印象怎么样？

translation.en: Solomon. Oh, he is so attractive.
translation.zh: ‎所罗门 噢 他好有吸引力

translation.en: I mean, not just attractive from the looks,
translation.zh: ‎不仅是外表有吸引力

translation.en: but also, like, we have something in common.
translation.zh: ‎而且我们还有共同点

translation.en: Helping people of different disabilities, including autism, be themselves,
translation.zh:
‎帮助有各种障碍的人
‎包括自闭症 做自己

translation.en: and it's like, oh, I'm just so nervous, and…
translation.zh:
‎这简直是…
‎噢 我真是太紧张了 然后…

translation.en: Oh, by the way, I'm just… in love.
translation.zh: ‎噢 对了 我真是…坠入爱河了

translation.en: We also share lots of hobbies.
translation.zh: ‎我们还有很多共同爱好

translation.en: -[Cian] Did you just say you're in love? -Yes.
translation.zh:
‎-你说你坠入爱河了？
‎-是的

translation.en: Hey, I'm back.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 我回来了

translation.en: [Solomon] Hey.
translation.zh: ‎嘿

translation.en: I'm just very…
translation.zh: ‎我只是非常的…

translation.en: so authentic about spirituality
translation.zh: ‎对自己的精神追求毫不掩饰

translation.en: and just with the Law of Attraction. Like, I just love it so much.
translation.zh:
‎对于这个吸引力法则
‎我实在是太喜欢了

translation.en: So…
translation.zh: ‎所以…

translation.en: -Let's enjoy our drinks. -[Solomon] Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: ‎我们喝饮料吧

translation.en: It's really good.
translation.zh: ‎很好喝

translation.en: So have you tried online dating?
translation.zh: ‎你有没有试过网络相亲？

translation.en: Well, I did, but I was just a little too nervous.
translation.zh:
‎这个嘛 我试过
‎但我只是有点太紧张了

translation.en: I kind of… It kind of creeped me out.
translation.zh: ‎我这点…这有点让我毛骨悚然

translation.en: -Yeah. -No, no, no, no, no.
translation.zh:
‎-是的
‎-不行不行

translation.en: Bad idea. Bad idea.
translation.zh: ‎坏主意

translation.en: With me, online dating didn't go too well.
translation.zh: ‎我也是 网络相亲不是很顺利

translation.en: -Yeah. -'Cause I feel like I just get judged.
translation.zh:
‎-是啊
‎-因为我感觉自己总被人简单地评断

translation.en: You gotta get to know the person for who they are.
translation.zh:
‎你得先了解一下
‎对方到底是个怎样的人

translation.en: You know, I told you I'm into spirituality and all that.
translation.zh:
‎我刚才跟你说了
‎我很喜欢研究精神世界的东西

translation.en: [Dani] Yes, you sure do. Tell me about that.
translation.zh: ‎嗯 你是说了 再多跟我讲讲

translation.en: I love it.
translation.zh: ‎我很喜欢

translation.en: It's like, literally, I listen to… You okay?
translation.zh: ‎真的 我整天都在听… 你没事吧？

translation.en: I am in love with you.
translation.zh: ‎我爱上你了

translation.en: Huh?
I think you are so hot.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得你好性感

translation.en: -[Cian] What's up, Solomon? -I wanna take a little break.
translation.zh:
‎-怎么了 所罗门？
‎-我想稍微休息一下

translation.en: -[Cian] Yeah, sure. -I'm sorry.
translation.zh:
‎-嗯 好的
‎-对不起

translation.en: [Cian] If you need to take a break, take a break.
translation.zh: ‎如果你需要休息 那就去休息一下

translation.en: -I'm sorry. -It's okay. [chuckles]
translation.zh:
‎-对不起
‎-没关系

translation.en: Okay, maybe the situation's a little awkward.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 也许情况是有点尴尬

translation.en: I think I might have frightened him off.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得我可能把他吓跑了
